name: Design Routing Code
title: DRC
definition: Identifies the customer location routing code for the design contact for this request.
usageNotes: Required when the ACT field is “N” “C” or “T” the   RTR field is “S” or “1-10” and the STREET    (DSGCON) field is not populated or the DSGCON   FAX NO field is not populated.
Prohibited when the first position of the RTR field is   “F”.
fieldNotes: The routing code represents the following   information:    Company    Street    Floor    Room    City    State/Province    ZIP Code
When populated this will be the first choice for   routing the DLR.
Valid DRC codes are outlined in Telcordia   Technologies’ practice BR-751-100-465.
